name: Santa Claus Calls You - 3D christmas games tracker
name_original: Santa Claus Calls You - 3D christmas games tracker
description:
Santa is calling on YOU! Help Santa collect presents for Christmas!

Play as Santa Claus as you switch and match gummy candy for Christmas! Be amazed by the best new combos and puzzles!

Drop jewels and crush ice in this epic game full of color for kids, girls and all ages!

Have fun playing the top match 3 puzzle game today!!
